description: The taskSuspended notification indicates that the sending
agent senses that a task has been suspended.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRVT-SYS-INFO-MIB::taskSuspended PRVT-SYS-INFO-MIB::taskName s EXAMPLE PRVT-SYS-INFO-MIB::taskId i 9999

description: This is the name of the task.
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-INFO-MIB::taskName

description: This is the task ID assigned by OS to a task in the
variables.name: PRVT-SYS-INFO-MIB::taskId
